david.database module

class david.database.Database(db_name)[source]

Bases: object

This class handles database operations for students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

Parameters:

db_name (str) – The name of the SQLite database file

backup_database(backup_filename)[source]

Creates a backup of the database.

Parameters:

backup_filename (str) – The name of the backup file

Returns:

None

Return type:

None

None

Creates a new course in the database.

Parameters:

  • course_id (str) – Unique identifier for the course

  • course_name (str) – Name of the course

  • instructor_id (str) – Unique identifier for the instructor teaching the course

Returns:

None

None

create_instructor(instructor_id, name, age, email)[source]

Creates a new instructor in the database.

Parameters:

  • instructor_id (str) – Unique identifier for the instructor

  • name (str) – Name of the instructor

  • age (int) – Age of the instructor

  • email (str) – Email address of the instructor

Raises:

sqlite3.IntegrityError – If the instructor_id already exists

Returns:

None

None

david.pyqt_project module

class david.pyqt_project.SchoolManagementGUI(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: QMainWindow

This class represents the main window for the School Management System GUI.

It provides the graphical interface for managing students, instructors, courses, and registrations in a school environment. Users can add, edit, delete, and display records, as well as export and back up the database.

Parameters:

  • db (Database) – An instance of the Database class for data storage

  • student_name (QLineEdit) – Input field for the student’s name

  • student_age (QLineEdit) – Input field for the student’s age

  • student_email (QLineEdit) – Input field for the student’s email

  • student_id (QLineEdit) – Input field for the student’s ID

  • instructor_name (QLineEdit) – Input field for the instructor’s name

  • instructor_age (QLineEdit) – Input field for the instructor’s age

  • instructor_email (QLineEdit) – Input field for the instructor’s email

  • instructor_id (QLineEdit) – Input field for the instructor’s ID

  • course_id (QLineEdit) – Input field for the course ID

  • course_name (QLineEdit) – Input field for the course name

  • course_instructor (QComboBox) – Dropdown for selecting the course instructor

  • reg_student (QComboBox) – Dropdown for selecting a student during registration

  • reg_course (QComboBox) – Dropdown for selecting a course during registration

  • records_table (QTableWidget) – Table displaying all records

add_course()[source]

Adds a new course to the database using the input fields for course ID, name, and selected instructor.

Raises:

ValueError – If there is an issue with the provided input values.

add_instructor()[source]

Adds a new instructor to the database using the input fields for name, age, email, and instructor ID.

Raises:

ValueError – If the age is not an integer or if an input field is left empty.

add_student()[source]

Adds a new student to the database using the input fields for name, age, email, and student ID.

Raises:

ValueError – If the age is not an integer or if an input field is left empty.

backup_database()[source]

Creates a backup of the current database by saving it to a predefined backup file.

Raises:

IOError – If there is an issue during the backup process.

clear_course_fields()[source]

Clears the input fields in the course form.

clear_instructor_fields()[source]

Clears the input fields in the instructor form.

clear_student_fields()[source]

Clears the input fields in the student form.

export_database()[source]

Exports the current database to a selected file location.

Raises:

IOError – If there is an issue with saving the file to the specified location.

init_ui()[source]

Initializes the main UI components, including tabs for students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

refresh_display()[source]

Refreshes the records displayed in the records table, showing the latest student, instructor, course, and registration information from the database.

register_student()[source]

Registers a selected student for a selected course in the database.

Raises:

ValueError – If the student or course selection is invalid or missing.

setup_course_form(layout)[source]

Sets up the form for adding a course.

Parameters:

layout (QVBoxLayout) – The layout to add the form fields and button to

setup_display_tab(layout)[source]

Sets up the display table for showing all records of students, instructors, courses, and registrations.

Parameters:

layout (QVBoxLayout) – The layout to add the display table to

setup_instructor_form(layout)[source]

Sets up the form for adding an instructor.

Parameters:

layout (QVBoxLayout) – The layout to add the form fields and button to

setup_menu()[source]

Sets up the main menu with options for database backup and export.

setup_registration_form(layout)[source]

Sets up the form for registering a student in a course.

Parameters:

layout (QVBoxLayout) – The layout to add the form fields and button to

setup_student_form(layout)[source]

Sets up the form for adding a student.

Parameters:

layout (QVBoxLayout) – The layout to add the form fields and button to

update_all_dropdowns()[source]

Updates all dropdowns (comboboxes) used for student, instructor, and course selection.

update_instructor_dropdown()[source]

Updates the dropdown list for instructor selection by fetching the latest instructors from the database.

update_registration_dropdowns()[source]

Updates the dropdowns used for student and course selection during registration.

update_student_dropdown()[source]

Updates the dropdown list for student selection by fetching the latest students from the database.
